Given the details mentioning "converted to request," "log incident," and "raised incident," I'm leaning towards "Miscellaneous" as it best encapsulates the procedural and cross-referencing nature of the request, rather than fitting neatly into hardware, HR, access, purchase, storage, or project-specific buckets.
